data.text:
@RevDJEsq lolol

also it's apparently VERY cold in there
@kvanaren Maybe it’s just the windows https://t.co/Z5tx1KoPMD
@kvanaren It looks like the office from the Veronica Mars movie??
@lokified but this one is HUGE. and he's 30 days over on rent! he does not have Vintage Decorative Motorcycle money!!

@kvanaren I have been to several cafes that have old motorcycles, engine blocks, vintage suitcases, old sewing machines…

…wow, I go to a lot of hipster cafes.
@kvanaren Maybe he ordered it and it came flat-packed like ikea furniture and he put it together and realized it would never fit through the door so there it stayed
and if it's NOT functional, then my question returns to WHAT??

Why would you just park a motorcycle in the middle of the floor? Surely it's a recipe for dirt and wetness? Also in this orientation it seems to be right next to an espresso machine. You park a road vehicle next to food prep??

WHAT?! 

WHY is there a motorcycle parked in his office?? Is it functional? Is it decor? What floor is this place on - does he drive it in and then send it up an elevator?
But here's the real question: (h/t  @RevDJEsq for previewing this for me) https://t.co/a0UnNNXSTf

It's also CLEARLY too big for their finances - the opening shot of Cibrian in his office is him holding a notice that the rent is 30 days overdue, which, yeah! no kidding! you've rented a mansion for a one-man private eye business!

also it's a private detective's office and there is *zero* privacy in there. if the office is so big and important that you need multiple rooms, surely you'd also need those rooms to be meaningfully separate?
It's so! big! and as far as I can tell, it's just Cibrian and his assistant working there, so it's confusing to me why you'd need so much space https://t.co/9i7p0u1W3X
